author: wsjcom
title: Uma Thurman Levels Accusations Against Weinstein, Tarantino
text:
NEW YORK—Actress Uma Thurman, in long-awaited remarks, has accused embattled Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein of forcing himself upon her sexually and also accused “Kill Bill” director Quentin Tarantino of making her perform a dangerous car stunt that injured her.
Ms. Thurman’s allegations against Mr. Weinstein had been anticipated since she hinted late last year that she had a story to tell about the beleaguered movie mogul, who has been accused of sexual misconduct against many women, but wanted to wait until she was...
